To avoid arousing suspicion, Sam carefully sources materials and information through a network of fellow hobbyists, mail-order shops, and online forums. He is meticulous about covering his tracks, maintaining a low profile, and keeping his illicit activities hidden from his family, students, and colleagues.

As Sam becomes increasingly obsessed with his projects and delves deeper into the world of explosives, he must navigate the fine line between his creative pursuits and dangerous curiosity.
